title: Cash Wheel
description: Contestants guess letters to complete phrases and spin the wheel to win cash prizes.
quote: You can go home a thousandaire!
altHero: a game show wheel stopped on “Cash Cannon”
alt2: a game show set with Grunkle Stan raising his arms up
alt3: a Wheel of Fortune-like display with a mystery phrase and woman in a dress standing by
alt4: Grunkle Stan excited in front of a huge pile of cash
